description:
Made using Whittaker’s finest milk chocolate and loaded with crunchy, toasted coconut, it's the bar for coconut lovers.

  • Ingredients: milk chocolate [sugar, cocoa solids 33% (pure cocoa butter & cocoa mass), NZ milk powder 30%, emulsifier (soy lecithin), vanilla flavour] and toasted coconut 18%
  • Allergens, may contain: peanuts, other tree nuts and gluten
  • A family legacy, Whittaker’s is New Zealand’s finest chocolate and has been since 1896
  • Based on rich Ghanian cocoa pods that are sun-dried to perfection before processing in small batches in Porirua New Zealand
  • Rainforest alliance certified
name: Whittaker's Coconut Block Chocolate
